sn54.2:4.1: “Mendicants, when mindfulness of breathing is developed and cultivated it’s very fruitful and beneficial.
sn54.2:4.2: And how is mindfulness of breathing developed and cultivated to be very fruitful and beneficial?
sn54.2:4.3: It’s when a mendicant develops mindfulness of breathing together with the awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, samādhi, and
sn54.2:4.4: equanimity, which rely on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripen as letting go.
sn54.2:4.5: Mindfulness of breathing, when developed and cultivated in this way, is very fruitful and beneficial.”
